description:
Let the school festival begin! The Special Abilty Type class has put a lot of hard work into their attraction, "RPG: Aladdin and the Magic Lamp." Mikan can`t wait to get the show on the road... but they haven`t had a single customer!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Meiro de Shoubu: Mahou no Lamp
迷路で勝負・魔法のランプ
